verses.text: Alleluia. Give thanks to the Lord: for he is good: for his mercy \add endures\add* for ever.
Give thanks to the God of gods: for his mercy \add endures\add* for ever.
Give thanks to the Lord of lords: for his mercy \add endures\add* for ever.
To him who alone has wrought great wonders: for his mercy \add endures\add* for ever.
To him who made the heavens by understanding; for his mercy \add endures\add* for ever.
To him who established the earth on the waters; for his mercy \add endures\add* for ever.
To him who alone made great lights; for his mercy \add endures\add* for ever.
The sun to rule the day; for his mercy \add endures\add* for ever.
The moon and the stars to rule the night; for his mercy \add endures\add* for ever.
To him who smote Egypt with their first-born; for his mercy \add endures\add* for ever.
And brought Israel out of the midst of them; for his mercy \add endures\add* for ever:
with a strong hand, and a high arm: for his mercy \add endures\add* for ever.
To him who divided the Red Sea into parts: for his mercy \add endures\add* for ever:
and brought Israel through the midst of it: for his mercy \add endures\add* for ever:
and overthrew Pharao and his host in the Red Sea: for his mercy endures for ever.
To him who led his people through the wilderness: for his mercy \add endures\add* for ever.
To him who smote great kings: for his mercy \add endures\add* for ever:
and slew mighty kings; for his mercy \add endures\add* for ever:
Seon king of the Amorites: for his mercy \add endures\add* for ever:
and Og king of Basan: for his mercy \add endures\add* for ever:
and gave their land \add for\add* an inheritance: for his mercy \add endures\add* for ever:
even an inheritance to Israel his servant: for his mercy \add endures\add* for ever.
For the Lord remembered us in our low estate; for his mercy \add endures\add* for ever:
and redeemed us from our enemies; for his mercy \add endures\add* for ever.
Who gives food to all flesh; for his mercy \add endures\add* for ever.
Give thanks to the God of heaven; for his mercy \add endures\add* for ever.
